parameters: Yo, you're all up in my physical.
And it's going to stay that way. Only employees can go past this

and I was supposed to open all of the Jack-in-a-Box boxes.
If you open up all of 7 of them around the store, I'll tell you
Damn, I don't have enough money.
You're all out of swagger, playa! Make sure you keep that gauge
up by visiting the Kum & Leave!

Yeah, that's what everyone thinks. Why would there be such a place?
Even more importantly, why would you come in here if that's what you

Well I can tell you it wasn't her peepee.
